Module io.helidon.media.common
Package io.helidon.media.common

Class DefaultMediaSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.helidon.media.common.DefaultMediaSupport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MediaSupport
    public class DefaultMediaSupport
extends Object
implements MediaSupport
    MediaSupport which registers default readers and writers to the contexts.
